lead_paragraph: When Jose Mourinho and Pep Guardiola meet in their second Manchester derby on Wednesday they'll now have something in common. Both have prepared with humiliating 4-0 losses on their return to former clubs.

headline.print_headline: Mourinho Emulates Guardiola With 4-0 Humiliation vs Old Club
headline.main: Mourinho Emulates Guardiola With 4-0 Humiliation vs Old Club

snippet: When Jose Mourinho and Pep Guardiola meet in their second Manchester derby on Wednesday they'll now have something in common. Both have prepared with humiliating 4-0 losses on their return to former clubs....
